home.title: Find & sell used {highlight}
home.subtitle: Europe's leading marketplace for used coordinate measuring machines. Verified listings, reputable dealers, 100% commission-free.
home.currentMachinesDesc: Discover a selection of available coordinate measuring machines – new offers from verified dealers every day.
home.noListingsDesc: Be one of the first! List your measuring machine and reach buyers across Europe.
home.howItWorksSubtitle: Find the right measuring machine in three simple steps
home.step1Desc: Browse our selection with smart filters for manufacturer, year built, measuring range and more.
home.step2Desc: Send your inquiry directly to the seller – no detours, no intermediaries.
home.step3Desc: Negotiate and buy directly. CMM24 does not charge commission on the sale price.
home.whyTrustSubtitle: CMM24 connects buyers and sellers of metrology equipment – secure, transparent and commission-free.
home.trustVerifiedDesc: Every listing is checked by our team for completeness and plausibility before publication.
home.trustDirectDesc: Communicate directly with the seller. No intermediaries, no unnecessary detours.
home.trustGdprDesc: Your data is safe with us. We strictly adhere to European data protection standards.
home.trustNoCommissionDesc: CMM24 does not charge commission. Sellers keep 100% of the sale price.
home.trustEuropeDesc: Find machines across Europe – from Germany via the Netherlands to Italy and Poland.
home.trustFreeStartDesc: Create your first listing for free. No hidden costs, no risk.
home.leadingManufacturersDesc: Machines from all major brands – from Zeiss to Mitutoyo
home.sellerCtaTitle: Sell your measuring machine on CMM24
home.sellerCtaDesc: Reach qualified buyers across Europe. Create your first listing for free – completely risk-free.
home.sellerCtaBullet1: Start free – no credit card needed
home.sellerCtaBullet3: 100% commission-free – you keep the full price
home.sellerCtaFullPrice: You keep the full sale proceeds
home.faqSubtitle: Answers to the most important questions about coordinate measuring machines and CMM24
home.faq1Q: How much does a used coordinate measuring machine cost?
home.faq1A: The price for a used coordinate measuring machine typically ranges from €10,000 to €150,000, depending on manufacturer, age, measuring range and condition. Zeiss machines cost on average €40,000-80,000, Hexagon €30,000-70,000. On CMM24 you'll find current market prices and can compare offers directly.
home.faq2Q: Which manufacturers of coordinate measuring machines are there?
home.faq2A: The leading manufacturers of coordinate measuring machines are: Zeiss (Germany), Hexagon (Sweden), Wenzel (Germany), Mitutoyo (Japan), Coord3 (Italy), LK Metrology (UK), Nikon Metrology (Japan) and Aberlink (UK). On CMM24 you'll find used machines from all major manufacturers.
home.faq3Q: Are the listings on CMM24 verified?
home.faq3A: Yes, all listings on CMM24 are checked by our team before publication. We verify the completeness of information, the plausibility of technical data and the quality of images. Additionally, sellers can have their account verified.
home.faq4Q: How does the purchase process work on CMM24?
home.faq4A: The purchase process is simple: 1. Find the right machine with our filters, 2. Send an inquiry directly to the seller, 3. Negotiate directly without commission, 4. Arrange an on-site inspection. CMM24 only facilitates – the actual purchase takes place directly between buyer and seller.
home.faq5Q: Can I sell my measuring machine on CMM24?
home.faq5A: Yes, you can list your used coordinate measuring machine on CMM24 for free. Simply create an account, enter the technical data, upload images and your listing will be activated after review. With a paid plan you can offer multiple machines simultaneously.

about.title: The marketplace for metrology professionals
about.description: CMM24 connects buyers and sellers of coordinate measuring machines across Europe. We make the used machinery market more transparent, efficient and secure.
about.missionP1: The market for used coordinate measuring machines was long opaque and fragmented. Buyers had to research laboriously, sellers had difficulty finding the right prospects.
about.missionP2: CMM24 changes that. We've created a specialized platform that:
about.missionBullet1: Efficiently brings supply and demand together
about.missionBullet2: Creates transparency in prices and technical data
about.valuesSubtitle: These principles guide us in everything we do.
about.valueTransparencyDesc: Clear prices, honest descriptions and verified listings for informed decisions.
about.valueExpertiseDesc: Deep industry knowledge and personal service for buyers and sellers.
about.valueTrustDesc: Verified sellers and quality-checked offers for secure transactions.
about.valueReachDesc: Europe-wide network with machines and dealers from over 12 countries.
about.teamSubtitle: People passionate about metrology and technology.
about.ctaDesc: We're happy to help – whether you're looking for a machine, want to sell, or simply want to learn more about CMM24.

sell.title: Sell your measuring machine successfully
sell.description: Reach qualified buyers across Europe. Start free, no commission, no hidden fees.
sell.benefit1Desc: Reach qualified buyers from over 12 countries. Your listing will be available in 30 languages.
sell.benefit2Desc: No spam inquiries. We filter and verify all incoming contacts for you.
sell.benefit3Desc: CMM24 does not charge commission on successful sales. You keep 100% of the sale price.
sell.benefit4Desc: On average, our sellers receive the first inquiry within 48 hours.
sell.whyDesc: The specialized marketplace for coordinate measuring machines offers you decisive advantages over general platforms.
sell.stepsDesc: Our simple process gets you there quickly.
sell.step1Desc: Create your free company account in just 2 minutes.
sell.step2Desc: Our assistant guides you through all steps. Simply upload images and documents.
sell.step3Desc: Qualified buyers contact you directly through our secure system.
sell.step4Desc: Negotiate directly and close the sale – without commission.
sell.testimonial1: Within a week I had three serious inquiries. The sale was then quickly completed.
sell.testimonial2: Finally a platform specialized in metrology. The inquiries are of high quality.
sell.testimonial3: Easy to use and professional. Exactly what the market needed.
sell.faq1Q: How much does it cost to create a listing?
sell.faq1A: You can start free with one active listing. For more listings we offer affordable packages from €12.99/month.
sell.faq2A: No, we don't charge commission on successful sales. The agreed price is 100% yours.
sell.faq3Q: How long does it take to approve my listing?
sell.faq3A: We review each listing within 24 hours. Often within a few hours if information is complete.
sell.faq4A: CMM24 is a B2B marketplace. Sellers must be able to prove they have a business.
sell.faqMore: More questions? View all FAQs or contact us
sell.readyDesc: Start free now and reach thousands of potential buyers across Europe.
sell.readyNote: No credit card required • First listing free

howItWorks.title: How CMM24 works
howItWorks.description: Whether you're looking for a coordinate measuring machine or want to sell one – CMM24 makes the process simple, transparent and secure.
howItWorks.buyersDesc: Find the perfect used coordinate measuring machine – fast, easy and without hidden costs.
howItWorks.buyerStep1Desc: Use our comprehensive filters to find the perfect measuring machine. Filter by manufacturer, measuring range, year built and more.
howItWorks.buyerStep2Desc: Compare up to 5 machines directly with each other. All technical data at a glance – exportable as PDF.
howItWorks.buyerStep3Desc: Contact the seller directly through our secure inquiry form. No hidden fees, no spam.
howItWorks.buyerStep4Desc: Negotiate price and conditions directly with the seller. CMM24 does not charge commission.
howItWorks.sellersDesc: Reach qualified buyers across Europe. Start free with your first listing.
howItWorks.sellerStep1Desc: Create your company account in minutes. Start with a free listing.
howItWorks.sellerStep2Desc: Our step-by-step assistant guides you through the process. Upload images and documents.
howItWorks.sellerStep3Desc: Every listing is reviewed by us. This ensures only reputable offers are published.
howItWorks.sellerStep4Desc: Receive qualified inquiries directly in your dashboard. Manage leads and increase your success.
howItWorks.whyDesc: The specialized marketplace for metrology professionals.
howItWorks.benefit1Desc: Every listing is reviewed by our team before publication.
howItWorks.benefit2Desc: Sellers respond on average within 24 hours.
howItWorks.benefit3Desc: Specialized in business customers from the metrology industry.
howItWorks.benefit4Desc: CMM24 does not charge commission on successful sales.
howItWorks.pricingDesc: Start free and upgrade as needed. No hidden fees, no commissions.
howItWorks.pricingNote: All prices excl. VAT • Annual payment: 2 months free
howItWorks.ctaDesc: Whether buyer or seller – start now and become part of Europe's leading marketplace for coordinate measuring machines.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.description: Find answers to the most common questions about CMM24.
faq.buyer1Q: How do I find the right measuring machine?
faq.buyer1A: Use our comprehensive filter options to search by manufacturer, measuring range, price and location. You can compare up to 5 machines directly to make the best choice.
faq.buyer2A: Yes, every listing is checked by our team for completeness and plausibility before publication. Look for the "Verified" badge for additional security.
faq.buyer3Q: How do I contact a seller?
faq.buyer3A: You can contact the seller directly via the inquiry form on the detail page. Your data is transmitted encrypted and only passed on to the seller.
faq.buyer4Q: Is there a warranty on the machines?
faq.buyer4A: CMM24 is a marketplace and facilitates between buyer and seller. Warranties and guarantees are agreed directly between the parties. We recommend conducting an inspection before purchase.
faq.seller1A: Getting started is free! With the Free plan you can create one active listing. For more listings we offer Starter (3), Professional (7) and Business (10) plans from €12.99/month.
faq.seller2Q: How do I create a listing?
faq.seller2A: After registration, our wizard guides you through the process in 6 simple steps: Master data, Technical data, Location, Description, Media and Preview.
faq.seller3A: We typically review new listings within 24 hours. You'll be notified by email once your listing has been activated.
faq.seller4Q: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
faq.seller4A: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. It will continue until the end of the paid period and won't be renewed.
faq.tech1A: You can upload images in JPG, PNG and WebP formats. The maximum file size is 10 MB per image. We recommend at least 5 meaningful photos.
faq.tech2A: Yes, you can add PDF documents such as data sheets, calibration certificates or maintenance logs. The maximum file size is 25 MB per document.
faq.tech3A: Yes, CMM24 is fully GDPR compliant. We only store necessary data and don't pass it on to third parties. Details can be found in our Privacy Policy.
faq.ctaDesc: Our support team is happy to help.

categoriesPage.title: Coordinate measuring machines by category
categoriesPage.subtitle: Each design has its strengths. Find the CMM type that best fits your measuring tasks and workpiece sizes.
categoriesPage.choosingIntro: Choosing the right CMM design depends on several factors:
categoriesPage.factorSizeDesc: Portal machines are suitable for small to medium parts, gantry systems for very large parts.
categoriesPage.factorAccessDesc: Cantilever machines offer the best accessibility from three sides.
categoriesPage.factorAccuracyDesc: Portal machines typically offer the highest precision through their stable bridge construction.
categoriesPage.factorTypeDesc: Flat, large-area parts such as body parts are often measured with horizontal arm machines.
categoriesPage.metaDesc: {count} used {name} on CMM24. {description} ✓ Verified offers ✓ Fair prices.
categoriesPage.app2: First article inspection and series testing
categoriesPage.buyingTips: What to look for when buying?
categoriesPage.buyingTipsDesc: When buying a used measuring machine, you should pay particular attention to the calibration certificate, maintenance history and general condition. On CMM24, all listings are reviewed before publication.

comparePage.emptyDesc: Add machines from the overview to compare them. You can compare up to {max} machines simultaneously.

sellerRegister.companyTooShort: Company name must be at least 2 characters.

sellerStats.title: Statistics
sellerStats.subtitle: Overview of your listing performance.
sellerStats.featureLockedDesc: Get detailed insights into views, inquiries and conversion rates of your listings.
sellerStats.featureLockedAudience: Dealers who want to optimize their listing performance and make data-driven decisions.
sellerStats.benefit1Desc: See exactly which listings get the most attention.
sellerStats.benefit2Desc: Track incoming inquiries and their progress.
sellerStats.benefit3Desc: Measure how well views convert into inquiries.
sellerStats.benefit4Desc: Compare performance across different time periods.
sellerStats.testimonialQuote: The statistics help us optimize our listings. Since the upgrade, we've received 30% more inquiries.

sellerInvoices.title: Invoices
sellerInvoices.subtitle: Overview of your invoices and payments.
sellerInvoices.changePaymentDesc: In the Stripe customer portal you can manage your payment method, billing address and other settings.

sellerEmails.title: Emails
sellerEmails.commSearch: Search by name, company or listing...
sellerEmails.commEmptyHint: Once you receive inquiries, you can communicate directly here.
sellerEmails.featureLockedDesc: With the integrated messaging center, respond to inquiries directly from CMM24 - buyers receive your reply by email and can respond directly on the platform.
sellerEmails.featureLockedAudience: Dealers with high inquiry volume who want to streamline their communication and reduce response times.
sellerEmails.lockedBenefit1Desc: Connect your Outlook or Gmail account and reply directly from CMM24.
sellerEmails.lockedBenefit2Desc: Use pre-built templates for common replies and save time.
sellerEmails.lockedBenefit3Desc: Every email is automatically linked to the corresponding inquiry.
sellerEmails.lockedBenefit4Desc: Save drafts and use professional email signatures.
sellerEmails.testimonialQuote: The Email Center saves me at least 30 minutes every day. Everything is in one place and I never lose track of an inquiry.
sellerEmails.onboardingDesc: Connect your email account to respond to inquiries directly from CMM24 – without switching between different tools.
sellerEmails.providerComingSoon: The {provider} integration will be available soon.
sellerEmails.benefit1Desc: Respond to inquiries directly from CMM24, no app switching
sellerEmails.oauthNote: CMM24 does not store passwords. The connection is secured via OAuth 2.0. You can disconnect at any time in the settings.
sellerEmails.errorInvalidState: Security validation failed. Please try again.
sellerEmails.tokenExpired: Access expired. Please reconnect your account.
sellerEmails.draftSaveFuture: Draft saving will be available in a future version.
sellerEmails.attachmentsFuture: Attachments will be displayed in a future version.

sellerTeam.title: Manage Team
sellerTeam.subtitle: Invite team members and manage roles.
sellerTeam.confirmRemoveMember: Do you really want to remove {name} from the team?
sellerTeam.adminPermissionsNote: Admins can manage listings and invitations.
sellerTeam.featureLockedDesc: With team management you can invite colleagues and handle inquiries together.
sellerTeam.featureLockedAudience: Dealers with multiple employees who handle inquiries or maintain listings together.
sellerTeam.lockedBenefit1Desc: Invite as many colleagues as you need
sellerTeam.lockedBenefit2Desc: Define who can see and edit what

sellerApi.title: API Access
sellerApi.subtitle: Manage API keys for programmatic integration.
sellerApi.createDialogDesc: Create an API key for programmatic access.
sellerApi.confirmRevoke: Do you really want to revoke the API key "{name}"?
sellerApi.confirmDelete: Do you really want to delete the API key "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.
sellerApi.noKeysDesc: Create your first API key for programmatic integration.
sellerApi.docsDesc: Read our documentation to learn how to use the CMM24 API.
sellerApi.keyCreatedDesc: Copy the API key now. It will only be shown once!
sellerApi.keyWarning: Store this key securely. It cannot be displayed again.
sellerApi.featureLockedHeadline: Integrate CMM24 into your existing systems
sellerApi.featureLockedDesc: With API access you can manage your listings programmatically and integrate into your existing workflows.
sellerApi.featureLockedAudience: Dealers with their own ERP or CRM system who need automatic synchronization.
sellerApi.lockedBenefit1Desc: Modern REST API for easy integration
sellerApi.lockedBenefit3Desc: Automatically transfer inquiries to your CRM

sellerAbo.title: Subscription
sellerAbo.subtitle: Manage your subscription and view your invoices.
sellerAbo.upgradePreparingDesc: Just a moment – your new features are being activated.
sellerAbo.upgradeSuccessDesc: Your upgrade was successful. You can now use all features of your new plan.
sellerAbo.cancellationPendingDesc: Your {plan} subscription will end on {date}. After that, you will be downgraded to the free plan.
sellerAbo.cancellationUntilThen: Until then, you can continue to use all features of your current plan.
sellerAbo.canReactivateAnytime: You can reactivate your subscription at any time before the expiry date.
sellerAbo.cancelDialogDesc: Help us improve our service. Why do you want to cancel?
sellerAbo.cancelFeedbackLabel: Anything else you'd like to tell us? (optional)
sellerAbo.cancelFeedbackPlaceholder: Your feedback helps us improve CMM24...
sellerAbo.confirmCancelDesc: Please confirm the cancellation of your {plan} plan.
sellerAbo.afterCancel2: After that, you will be downgraded to the free plan.
sellerAbo.afterCancel3: You can revoke the cancellation at any time before.
sellerAbo.cancelSuccess: Subscription will be cancelled at the end of the billing period
sellerAbo.invoicesDesc: Your invoices will be displayed here once payments are processed.
sellerAbo.noPaymentNeeded: No payment method required for the free plan.
sellerAbo.manageInPortal: Manage your payment details in the customer portal
sellerAbo.portalDesc: In the customer portal you can manage payment methods, billing address and more.
sellerAbo.upgradeCtaDesc: With an upgrade you get more active listings and additional features.
sellerAbo.supportHelp: Our support team is happy to help.
sellerAbo.upgradeSubtitle: Choose the right package for your needs.
sellerAbo.checkoutCanceled: Checkout was cancelled. Don't worry – you can upgrade at any time.
sellerAbo.earlyAdopterDesc: Get up to 40% off now – forever! Only for the first 100 customers.
sellerAbo.detailedComparisonDesc: All features of all plans compared side by side
sellerAbo.faq1Question: What is the Early Adopter Offer?
sellerAbo.faq1Answer: The first 100 customers receive up to 40% off the regular price – permanently, as long as the subscription remains active. These prices will never increase.
sellerAbo.faq2Answer: Yes! With the Business plan, you can add as many additional listings as you want for €7/month (€5 with annual billing) per listing.
sellerAbo.faq3Question: Why are you so much cheaper?
sellerAbo.faq3Answer: We're a new, lean team without oversized structures. Our goal is to make the CMM used market more accessible – not maximum profit.
sellerAbo.faq4Question: Can I cancel at any time?
sellerAbo.faq4Answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time at the end of the billing period. There is no minimum contract period.

sellerInquiries.title: Inquiries
sellerInquiries.totalCount: {count, plural, one {1 inquiry} other {# inquiries}} total
sellerInquiries.inquiriesWillAppear: Once prospects inquire about your machines, they will appear here.
sellerInquiries.notesPlaceholder: Notes about this inquiry (only visible to you)...
sellerInquiries.inquiryNotFoundDesc: The requested inquiry does not exist.
sellerInquiries.messagingLocked: Reply directly through the platform – upgrade your plan.
sellerInquiries.sentInquiriesHint: Inquiries you sent to other sellers will appear here.
